We are committed to protecting your
privacy and ensuring that your personal information is not collected, stored,
or used in any way by our service.

## Information Not Collected

We explicitly state that we do not collect any personal information from our
users.

## Use of Information

Given that we do not collect personal information, there is no use of such
information by our service.

## Sharing of Information

We do not share any personal information simply because we do not collect any.

## Children's Privacy

Our service does not specifically target or collect information from children
under the age of 13.
